Description: Four beads made in different shapes and materials. A: One big flattened spherical bead made of blue glass now corroded in pearlescent corrosion layer. B: Two smaller flattened spherical bead made of blue glass now corroded in pearlescent corrosion layer. C: One cylindrical segmented bead made of white faience, poor quality.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.15A, middle layer
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
